summary: An ordinance authorizing and directing the City Treasurer to cancel the assessment levied for the improvement of 42nd Avenue South, and other streets and avenues, by trunk sewer, Local Improvement District No. 3180, on portions of the south one-half of the Northwest quarter of the Southwest quarter of the Southwest quarter of Section Twenty-two (22), Township Twenty-four (24) North, Range Four (4) East, W.M., which have been deeded to the City of Seattle for street and alley purposes.
